entry.summary: Use your phone to scan the QR code, then snap a photo with Amber and solve the puzzle!

entry.title: "A Sea of Lights" Fan Art Event - Event Details
entry.content:
Liyue's Lantern Rite festival will soon be upon us, and the "A Sea of Lights" fan art event is right around the corner! Post your work for the chance to be richly rewarded with Primogems, as well a year's subscription to Adobe All Apps, CLIP STUDIO PAINT and Adobe Photoshop!

Read more on "A Sea of Lights" Fan Art Event - Event Details
entry.summary: Liyue's Lantern Rite festival will soon be upon us, and the "A Sea of Lights" fan art event is right around the corner! Post your work for the chance to be richly rewarded with Primogems, as well a year's subscription to Adobe All Apps, CLIP STUDIO PAINT and Adobe Photoshop!

entry.title: Light five kinds of Xiao Lanterns to share in the Grand Primogem Prize! The "Wish Upon a Lantern" web event has officially begun!
entry.content:
Legend has it that these lanterns will carry the wishes of the people to the adepti. The web event "Wish Upon a Lantern" has begun!

Read more on Light five kinds of Xiao Lanterns to share in the Grand Primogem Prize! The "Wish Upon a Lantern" web event has officially begun!
entry.summary: Legend has it that these lanterns will carry the wishes of the people to the adepti. The web event "Wish Upon a Lantern" has begun!

entry.title: Engraved Wishes
entry.content:
The first anniversary of Genshin Impact is approaching. Click the link below to send your Wishes and you will have the opportunity to engrave your own message on Paimon's blocks.

entry.summary: The first anniversary of Genshin Impact is approaching. Click the link below to send your Wishes and you will have the opportunity to engrave your own message on Paimon's blocks.

entry.title: Genshin Impact Raffle Event
entry.content:
To thank everyone for their constant support and companionship, Paimon has specially prepared a raffle event that you can take part in by sharing posts. During the event, share this post for a chance to win great rewards~

Read more on Genshin Impact Raffle Event
entry.summary: To thank everyone for their constant support and companionship, Paimon has specially prepared a raffle event that you can take part in by sharing posts. During the event, share this post for a chance to win great rewards~

entry.title: The "Aloy's Exploration Journal" Web Event has begun, explore the land of Teyvat together with Aloy to obtain rewards!
entry.content:
When Aloy sets foot on Teyvat, what kind of adventure will this Savior from Another World experience? Dear Traveler, please open "Aloy's Exploration Journal" to start the adventure!

entry.summary: When Aloy sets foot on Teyvat, what kind of adventure will this Savior from Another World experience? Dear Traveler, please open "Aloy's Exploration Journal" to start the adventure!

entry.title: Genshin Impact Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch
entry.content:
The Genshin Impact Version 2.2 "Into the Perilous Labyrinth of Fog" update arrived on October 13. The Genshin Impact Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch has also started. Live stream your content, complete missions and earn Primogems!

Read more on Genshin Impact Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch
entry.summary: The Genshin Impact Version 2.2 "Into the Perilous Labyrinth of Fog" update arrived on October 13. The Genshin Impact Streamer Recruitment Event on Twitch has also started. Live stream your content, complete missions and earn Primogems!

entry.title: "Meeting of Light and Shadow" Co-Op Photo Submission Contest
entry.content:
During the event, you can post your original Co-Op photographs that meet the event submission criteria on Twitter, and you will be considered a successful participant.

Read more on "Meeting of Light and Shadow" Co-Op Photo Submission Contest
entry.summary: During the event, you can post your original Co-Op photographs that meet the event submission criteria on Twitter, and you will be considered a successful participant.

entry.title: Results: Version 2.3 Commemorative Lottery Event
entry.content:
To commemorate V2.3 "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms," we have specially prepared a lottery community event! Participate in the event and write down your well-wishes, and get the chance to win Primogems and attractive merchandise prizes!

Read more on Results: Version 2.3 Commemorative Lottery Event
entry.summary: To commemorate V2.3 "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms," we have specially prepared a lottery community event! Participate in the event and write down your well-wishes, and get the chance to win Primogems and attractive merchandise prizes!
